title: Moto G22 goes official priced at €169 w/ MediaTek Helio G37, Android 12 pre-installed
content:
Although almost entirely revealed by leaks, Motorola has now unveiled the Moto G22, which is firmly rooted at the low-end of the Android spectrum.

more…

The post Moto G22 goes official priced at €169 w/ MediaTek Helio G37, Android 12 pre-installed appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Although entirely revealed by leaks, Motorola has now unveiled the Moto G22 which is firmly rooted at the low-end of the Android spectrum.
